amendment.description: At the end of the bill (before the short title) insert the following: SEC.___. None of the funds made available in this Act may be used for the continued detention of any individual who is detained, as of the date of the enactment of this Act, by the United States at United States Naval Station, Guantanamo Bay, Cuba, and who has been approved for release or transfer to a foreign country.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 69 printed in House Report 113-170 to prevent the further detention of Guantanamo Bay detainees that have already been cleared for release.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Nadler amendment (A060) Failed by recorded vote: 176 - 242 (Roll no. 408).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A060) offered by Mr. Nadler.
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
